map marker pin About us 
Welcome to something delicious

Experience the island life - unique rum & good eats. Our chefs take food seriously, not just themselves. Experience the difference!
Our Menu food 
Reviews

review by - Google

K.L.:

This is a cool little place. The turkey club is amazing. Reasonable prices and great service!

review by - Google

S. Garcia:

Amazing food along side with a great atmosphere. Thank you so much everyone who helped make it a memorable experience.

review by - Google

Laura Williams:

Came across this place walking around to get ice cream for kids. Ended up getting ice cream and mom/dad could get an adult beverage and sit outside and enjoy. Love it

review by - Google

Angela Baker:

Came in for a drink in the late evening, great friendly service and atmosphere. We sat outside at the bar/patio area.

review by - Google

Matt Simmons:

Awesome place!! Great staff and atmosphere. Smash burgers are incredible as well as the cocktails. Easy access to the beach. Great addition to IOP!!!
